org.echo.mobile.framework.model.socketoperations

Class FullAccountsSocketOperation

  • SocketOperation
    • org.echo.mobile.framework.model.socketoperations.FullAccountsSocketOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonDeserializable<T>, JsonSerializable

    public class FullAccountsSocketOperation
extends SocketOperation

    This function fetches all relevant class Account objects for the given accounts, and subscribes to updates to the given accounts. If any of the strings in namesOrIds cannot be tied to an account, that input will be ignored. All other accounts will be retrieved and subscribed.

    See Also:
    class Account

    • Constructor Detail

      • FullAccountsSocketOperation

        public FullAccountsSocketOperation(int apiId,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> namesOrIds,
                                   boolean shouldSubscribe,
                                   Network network,
                                   int callId,
                                   Callback<java.util.Map> callback)

        This function fetches all relevant class Account objects for the given accounts, and subscribes to updates to the given accounts. If any of the strings in namesOrIds cannot be tied to an account, that input will be ignored. All other accounts will be retrieved and subscribed.

        Parameters:
        apiId - Blockchain api id, which contains operation
        namesOrIds - Each item must be the name or ID of an account to retrieve
        shouldSubscribe - Flag of subscription on updates
        namesOrIds - Each item must be the name or ID of an account to retrieve
        shouldSubscribe - Flag of subscription on updates
        See Also:
        class Account
